string.text: Night vision technology installation for low light conditions, which relies on night-useful spectral and intensity range techniques to sense radiation that is invisible to a human observer.
An improvement to the night vision technology, which introduces better system light gain, system resolution and photosensitivity to increase the visual quality

An improvement to the night vision technology, which introduces better system light gain, system resolution and photosensitivity to increase the visual quality, as well as white phosphor display for better acuity and reduced eye impairment
